title: Privacy
content:
cosmoslevel.com Privacy

Dear Visitors,

Thank you for using cosmoslevel.com. We urge you to read carefully both the Terms and Conditions applicable to the account type you’ve opted for and this Personal Data Processing and Confidentiality Policy to be fully informed about how we handle and secure the personal data you provide to us.

cosmoslevel.com is a versatile SaaS (Software as a Service) platform designed to streamline the interaction between professionals and clients within an appointment-based business model. This innovative app facilitates a comprehensive suite of features to enable efficient management of appointments, services, and professional-client engagement across various industries.

For professionals, cosmoslevel.com provides a robust ecosystem to create and manage their service offerings. They can setup their availability with a connected calendar, design multi-language offers, and configure location preferences for in-person meetings or online sessions via integrations with Google Meet and Zoom. Professionals can also leverage the platform to define custom questions, helping to curate personalized experiences for their clients at the point of booking. For added convenience, professionals have the option to sync with their Google Calendar, check for scheduling conflicts, and employ smart scheduling options like time slot increments and minimum notice requirements before bookings.

Clients benefit from a seamless booking experience through a concise wizard that guides them from selecting a service to choosing a convenient date and time. Products associated with service offers can be selected, and reminders for scheduled appointments are sent out via email, ensuring a smooth preparatory process.

Combining these features with an intuitive user interface, cosmoslevel.com aims to elevate professionals’ ability to attract and retain clients through efficient scheduling, customizable offerings, and seamless integrations, while providing clients with a convenient and reliable way to access and book the services they need. Whether handling individual appointments or managing a suite of services, cosmoslevel.com is geared to enhance organizational capabilities and improve the customer experience in a modern, digital-focused world.

For the purposes of providing cosmoslevel.com services, your personal data will be processed by us at HOP TRAINING SRL, located at Str. Morii 33B, Sat Valea Mare Podgoria, Arges, Romania, registered at the National Trade Register Office under no. J03/998/2021, Unique Registration Code 44131318. We manage the website www.cosmoslevel.com, in compliance with the provisions of EU Regulation 2016/679 on personal data protection (GDPR) as well as applicable national and European data protection legislation.

I. Definitions:

  • “Site” means www.cosmoslevel.com, property of the data controller HOP TRAINING SRL, with registered office in Arges, Romania.
  • “Application” refers to our website application, cosmoslevel.com, www.cosmoslevel.com .
  • “Visitor” denotes any natural person accessing the Site or the cosmoslevel.com spaces or seeking information regarding the Operator’s products.
  • “User Client” signifies a natural person to whom services are provided by the Operator, via the site or other means.
  • “Professional User” indicates a legal entity featured on the Operator’s platform to be contacted by User Clients.
  • “cosmoslevel.com Public Profile” refers to the page associated with a Professional User, where User Clients may schedule appointments within the cosmoslevel.com platform or contact the Professional User.
  • “Personal Data”, “Special Categories of Personal Data”, “Processing”, “Controller”, “Data Subject”, “Processor”, “GDPR”, “Supervisory Authority”, and “EEA” are as defined in the original template.

II. Your Rights and Our Obligations Regarding Personal Data Processing:

You have various rights regarding the access, rectification, erasure, and portability of your personal data, along with the right to object to processing and the right to withdraw consent at any time. These rights can be exercised by submitting a written request, signed and dated, to HOP TRAINING SRL at support@cosmoslevel.com . We will respond within one month from receipt of your request, which may be extended by two additional months if necessary.

We also commit to taking all necessary organizational and technical measures to secure your personal data and to inform you immediately in case of unauthorized access to personal data.

III. Personal Data Processed by cosmoslevel.com:

We may collect the following types of information:

  • Personal identification information (Name, email address, phone number, etc.)
  • Professional credentials and qualifications
  • Appointment details and scheduling information
  • Billing and payment information
  • User-generated content, such as reviews and feedback
  • Technical data (IP address, browser type, operating system, etc.)
  1. Site Visitors:
  • The personal data of visitors to www.cosmoslevel.com are processed when accessing the Site, and according to our cookie policy, data such as IP, location, preferences, and interactions with visited pages are collected. The processing of this data is to ensure an optimal online experience and for marketing purposes.
  1. User Clients:
  • Various personal data are processed when creating a user account, making online reservations, and reviewing and rating professional services within the cosmoslevel.com platform.
  1. Professional Users:
  • When a professional (salon, clinic, or independent professional) desires to utilize cosmoslevel.com to manage bookings, they will register on the platform and their personal data will be processed as described. Professional Users will be expressly responsible for obtaining the consent of the other professionals associated with their business who are added to the platform.
  • Professionals can manually add or connect contacts through Google Workspace APIs.
    Importantly, this data is not used to develop, improve, or train generalized AI or machine learning models.
  1. Assistance and Chat Support:
  • cosmoslevel.com offers chat support and assistance for using the platform or related services. Consent for processing personal data provided in these interactions is obtained by the act of initiating the support request.

Your information is used for the following purposes:

  • To provide and improve our services
  • To communicate with you about your account and services
  • For billing and payment processing
  • To personalize your experience on our platform
  • For analytics and service optimization
  • To comply with legal obligations

IV. Transfer of Personal Data Processed by cosmoslevel.com:

All personal data processed by cosmoslevel.com may be transferred in accordance with our data transfer policies, which comply with GDPR and other applicable data protection laws.

V. Sharing Your Information

We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share information with:

  • Service providers who perform services on our behalf
  • Legal authorities when required by law
  • Business transfers, should we be involved in a merger or acquisition

VI. Data Security

We employ a variety of security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure.

VII. International Transfers

We may transfer, process, and store your information on servers located outside of your home country, which may not offer the same level of data protection.

VIII. Children’s Privacy

Our services are not directed to individuals under the age of 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children without proper consent from a parent or guardian.
 

IX. Third party services:

  • Google Calendar Access and Use: At user request, cosmoslevel.com accesses and uses Google Calendar data to check for appointment conflicts. Data is stored for a duration of 30 days and deleted upon user’s request for account deletion or earlier if requested.
  • Google Data Storage and Sharing: Calendar event data and user refresh tokens are stored securely to update events. Google Workspace APIs are not used to develop, improve, or train generalized AI and/or ML models. No sharing of Google data with third parties occurs unless specifically requested by the user or required by law. App’s use and transfer to any other app of information received from Google APIs will adhere to Google API Services User Data Policy, including the Limited Use requirements.
  • Zoom Access and Use: At user request, cosmoslevel.com stores the Zoom user and refresh token to create and update Zoom meeting links. No further Zoom user data is accessed or used.
  • Zoom Data Storage and Sharing: Only necessary Zoom data for the integration is stored and is held until the user removes the integration. No sharing of Zoom data with third parties occurs unless requested by the user or required by law. App’s use and transfer to any other app of information received from Zoom APIs will adhere to Zoom Privacy Policy, including the Limited Use requirements.
  • Stripe: We utilize Stripe for processing payments. Your payment information is handled by Stripe in accordance with their Privacy Policy. We do not store your full payment information on our servers.
  • OpenAI: We may utilize OpenAI services for features like text generation or analysis. When using the AI powered text generation in the cosmoslevel.com editor the prompts are kept for 30 days. Your data usage is subject to OpenAI's Privacy Policy.
  • Google Gemini AI: (If applicable) We may utilize Google Gemini AI services for various AI-powered features.When using the AI powered text generation in the cosmoslevel.com editor the prompts are kept for 30 days. Your data usage in connection with Gemini is governed by Google's Privacy Policy. 
     

Contact Us

If you have any questions about the Terms and Conditions, please contact us at support@cosmoslevel.com
